about_the_game:
Imagine an outlaw shooter with easily recognizable elements, whether that be an abandoned depot or an underprivileged area of the depressed city you grew up in or tried to avoid.



In Tacticool, Outlaw, Military, Guerilla, and Special Ops assemble into Squads, complete Missions, and build a strong brotherhood in Clans. Here, you can make your own military story alone or gather an army of like-minded people.



Do you enjoy rushing into a gunfight or sniping enemies from a hidden spot? With over 32 operators and 40 kinds of weapons, you can play however you like.



When you want to create pure chaos without a tinge of guilt, jump into PvE Mode and smash zombies on repeat. Want to be king of the hill? Battle Royale mode is at your service.



Car shootouts are a special kind of tacticool pleasure. You can literally run your enemies into the ground and smash through walls and fences! In this world, a rollover vehicle is truly priceless.



Welcome to the Tacticool brotherhood, soldier! Let the battle begin!

Imagine an outlaw shooter with easily recognizable elements, whether that be an abandoned depot or an underprivileged area of the depressed city you grew up in or tried to avoid.



In Tacticool, Outlaw, Military, Guerilla, and Special Ops assemble into Squads, complete Missions, and build a strong brotherhood in Clans. Here, you can make your own military story alone or gather an army of like-minded people.



Do you enjoy rushing into a gunfight or sniping enemies from a hidden spot? With over 32 operators and 40 kinds of weapons, you can play however you like.



When you want to create pure chaos without a tinge of guilt, jump into PvE Mode and smash zombies on repeat. Want to be king of the hill? Battle Royale mode is at your service.



Car shootouts are a special kind of tacticool pleasure. You can literally run your enemies into the ground and smash through walls and fences! In this world, a rollover vehicle is truly priceless.



Welcome to the Tacticool brotherhood, soldier! Let the battle begin!

name: Tacticool

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Video Card with DX11 support, 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Top-down tactical shooter. Team-based 5v5 battles with destructible environment and car chases await you. Enjoy PvP and PvE modes, clan battles, special in-game events, and find new friends in the 30 million-strong Tacticool brotherhood!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Indonesian, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Malay
